TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlyphRun extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示單一大小之單一字型單一字體、使用單一呈現樣式的一系列圖像 (Glyph)。

span.span: Represents a sequence of glyphs from a single face of a single font at a single size, and with a single rendering style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件包含字型詳細資料，例如圖像索引和個別的字符的位置。The object includes font details such as glyph indices and individual glyph positions. 此外，物件包含執行所產生的原始 Unicode 字碼指標，字元字符緩衝區位移對應資訊，以及每個字元和每個字符的旗標。In addition, The object contains the original Unicode code points the run was generated from, character to glyph buffer offset mapping information, and per-character and per-glyph flags. 項目代表的輸出在 XAML 中。The element represents the output of a in XAML. 下列標記的語法用來描述項目。The following markup syntax is used to describe the element. [!code-xaml[GlyphsOvwSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphsOvwSample1/CS/default.xaml#1)] 每個字符定義指定與其他的對齊方式的標準。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 下圖定義兩個不同字符字元的各種印刷品質。The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters. ![圖像度量作圖器](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "圖像度量作圖器")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 兩個不同的字符字元各種印刷品質Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float32 pixelsPerDip) cil managed

param.name: pixelsPerDip
param.span: 「每一密度像素無關的像素 (Pixels Per Density Independent Pixel)」值，相當於縮放比例。

span.span: The Pixels Per Density Independent Pixel value, which is the equivalent of the scale factor.

param.span: 例如，如果螢幕的 DPI 是 120 (或 1.25，因為 120/96 = 1.25)，則會繪製 1.25 倍的每一密度像素無關的像素。

span.span: For example, if the DPI of a screen is 120 (or 1.25 because 120/96 = 1.25) , 1.25 pixel per density independent pixel is drawn.

param.span: DIP 是 WPF 使用的度量單位 (獨立於裝置解析度和 DPI 之外)。

span.span: DIP is the unit of measurement used by WPF to be independent of device resolution and DPIs.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AdvanceWidths As IList(Of Double)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<double> ^ AdvanceWidths { System::Collections::Generic::IList<double> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<double> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值的清單，代表對應到字符索引的遞增寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of values that represent the advance widths corresponding to the glyph indices.

value.span: 值的清單，代表遞增寬度。

span.span: A list of values that represent the advance widths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 換頁寬的清單中每個項目對應至所傳回的圖像值屬性。Each item in the list of advance widths corresponds to the glyph values returned by the property. N 名義原點第圖像 （glyph) 在執行 (n > 0) 是名義 n-1第圖像 （glyph） 再加上 n-1第前進加入沿著執行前進向量的寬度。The nominal origin of the nth glyph in the run (n>0) is the nominal origin of the n-1th glyph plus the n-1th advance width added along the runs advance vector. 基底字符通常會有非零提前寬度，而結合圖像 （glyph） 通常具有零提前寬度。Base glyphs generally have a non-zero advance width, whereas combining glyphs generally have a zero advance width.

value.span: 表示基準原點的 值。

span.span: A value representing the baseline origin.

span.span: Gets or sets the bidirectional nesting level of the .

value.span: 表示雙向巢狀層次的 值。

span.span: An value that represents the bidirectional nesting level.

span.span: Retrieves the for the .
The corresponding to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回包含組合中的所有圖像的幾何。The returned contains the combined geometry of all glyphs in the . 執行布林值的聯集運算的方式合併重疊的分佈。Overlapping contours are merged by performing a Boolean union operation.

summary.span: 取得或設定 值的清單，判斷在代表 的 Unicode 中針對每個 UTF16 字碼指標是否會有插入號停駐點。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of values that determine whether there are caret stops for every UTF16 code point in the Unicode representing the .

value.span: 值的清單，代表是否有插入號停駐點。

span.span: A list of values that represent whether there are caret stops.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是`null`Unicode 表示每個 UTF16 字碼指標的插入號停駐點是否。The return value is `null` if there is a caret stop for every UTF16 code point in the Unicode representing the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ClusterMap As IList(Of UShort)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ ClusterMap { System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值的清單，其會將 中的字元對應至字符索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of values that maps characters in the to glyph indices.

value.span: 值的清單，代表對應的字符索引。

span.span: A list of values that represent mapped glyph indices.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 沒有一個項目，每個清單中的字元。There is one entry per character in the list. 在清單中的每個值會提供第一個字符，所代表的位移，為對應的字元，由。Each value in the list gives the offset of the first glyph, represented by , to the corresponding character, represented by . 其中多個字元對應到單一的圖像，或無法分解對應於個別字元圖像 （glyph） 群組，所有字元的項目具有相同的值： 第一個字符，表示此群組的字元位移。Where multiple characters map to a single glyph, or to a glyph group that cannot be broken down to map exactly to individual characters, the entries for all the characters have the same value: the offset of the first glyph that represents this group of characters. 如果清單是`null`或等於，則會採用循序 1 對 1 對應。If the list is `null` or equal to , sequential 1 to 1 mapping is assumed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeviceFontName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定已最佳化 的特定裝置字型。

span.span: Gets or sets the specific device font for which the has been optimized.

value.span: 值，這個值表示裝置字型。

span.span: A value that represents the device font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呈現具有指定的裝置字型，內建支援的裝置上應該使用裝置特定的機制，來選取字型，並將它的 Unicode 字碼指標，而不是圖像索引來呈現。When a is rendered on a device that has built-in support for the named device font, the should be rendered using a device specific mechanism for selecting that font, and by sending Unicode code points rather than glyph indices. 不包含具名的裝置字型，內建支援的裝置上轉譯時應予忽略。When rendering onto a device that does not include built-in support for the named device font, should be ignored.

span.span: A value that represents the em size used for rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit GetCaretCharacterHitFromDistance (double distance, out bool isInside);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit GetCaretCharacterHitFromDistance(float64 distance, [out] bool& isInside) cil managed
Public Function GetCaretCharacterHitFromDistance (distance As Double, ByRef isInside As Boolean) As CharacterHit

param.name: distance
param.span: 用於計算插入號字元點擊的位移 (Offset)。

span.span: Offset to use for computing the caret character hit.

param.name: isInside
param.span: 判斷字元點擊是否在 中。

span.span: Determines whether the character hit is inside the .

summary.span: 擷取 值，這個值表示 之插入號 (Caret) 的字元點擊。

span.span: Retrieves the value that represents the character hit of the caret of the .

returns.span: 值，表示最接近 值的字元點擊。

span.span: A value that represents the character hit that is closest to the value.

returns.span: 如果字元點擊位於 ，out 參數 會傳回 ，否則傳回 。

span.span: The out parameter returns if the character hit is inside the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `distance`值代表從前置邊緣的位移。The `distance` value represents the offset from the leading edge of the . 如果叫用次數超出，點擊字元表示最接近的插入號字元內遇到。If the hit is outside the , the character hit represents the closest caret character hit within the . 結構代表字元中叫用的相關資訊— 已叫用次數，以及前置或尾端邊緣的相關資訊的第一個字元的索引。The structure represents information about a character hit within a —the index of the first character that was hit as well as information about the leading or trailing edge.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float64 GetDistanceFromCaretCharacterHit(valuetype System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit characterHit) cil managed

span.span: The to use for computing the offset.

summary.span: 擷取自 的前端邊緣到插入號停駐點 (包含指定的字元點擊) 之前端邊緣或尾端邊緣的位移。

span.span: Retrieves the offset from the leading edge of the to the leading or trailing edge of a caret stop containing the specified character hit.

returns.span: ，表示自 的前端邊緣到插入號停駐點 (包含字元點擊) 之前端邊緣或尾端邊緣的位移。

span.span: A that represents the offset from the leading edge of the to the leading or trailing edge of a caret stop containing the character hit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不叫用測試 0.0 的距離就會傳回。If the is not hit testable, the distance of 0.0 is returned. 使用屬性來判斷如果可以進行點擊測試。Use the property to determine if a can be hit test.

exception.span: 字元點擊在 Unicode 字串指定的範圍之外。

span.span: The character hit is outside the range specified by the Unicode string.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property GlyphIndices As IList(Of UShort)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ GlyphIndices { System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值的陣列，這些值表示呈現實體字型 (Physical Font) 中的圖像索引。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values that represent the glyph indices in the rendering physical font.

value.span: 值清單，這些值表示圖像索引。

span.span: A list of values that represent the glyph indices.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖像索引的預設值是由對應的 Unicode 字碼元素的內部文字中的字型的字元對應表定義。The default value of the glyph indices are defined by the font's character map table for the corresponding Unicode code points in the inner text.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property GlyphOffsets As IList(Of Point)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ GlyphOffsets { System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值的陣列，代表 中字符的位移。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values representing the offsets of the glyphs in the .

value.span: 值的清單，代表字符的位移。

span.span: A list of values representing the offsets of glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖像 （glyph） 的位移的值會加入至產生的最終原點圖像名義上的圖像原點。The glyph offset values are added to the nominal glyph origin to generate the final origin for the glyph. 屬性表示的名義上的圖像 origins 值。The property represents the values of the nominal glyph origins for the . 基底字符通常會有一個圖像 （glyph） 的單位的位移 （0，0） 結合圖像 （glyph） 通常會有的位移，正確地放置接近基底字符。Base glyphs generally have a glyph offset of (0, 0), combining glyphs generally have an offset that places them correctly on top of the nearest preceding base glyph.

value.span: 如果旋轉圖像則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the glyphs are rotated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，文字字元所組成，這些圖像會旋轉 90 ° 逆時針旋轉，使用垂直定位度量的基準。If is `true`, the glyphs that make up text characters are rotated 90° counter-clockwise, using vertical baseline positioning metrics.
